_json.gridTitle: The Perfect Pivot Hose Reel - Hammacher Schlemmer
_json.description: The Perfect Pivot Hose Reel - This is the reel that rotates 360° horizontally, enabling easy hose usage. Unlike conventional fixed-position reels that impede a hose’s extraction or tip over altogether when a gardener’s frustration leads to yanking, this one has a pivoting cylinder that naturally swings to whichever direction a hose is being pulled, enabling convenient watering without the need to reposition a wheeled reel or walk back to the reel to pull out more slack in the desired direction.
